18: עֹשֶׂ֛ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>He doth execute</n> מִשְׁפַּ֥ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>the judgment</n> יָת֖וֹם <sup>3490 </sup> <n>of the fatherless</n> וְאַלְמָנָ֑ה <sup>490 </sup> <n>and widow</n> וְאֹהֵ֣ב <sup>157 </sup> <n>and loveth</n> גֵּ֔ר <sup>1616 </sup> <n>the stranger</n> לָ֥תֶת <sup>5414 </sup> <n>in giving</n> ל֖וֹ לֶ֥חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>him food</n> וְשִׂמְלָֽה׃ <sup>8071 </sup> <n>and raiment</n>
19: וַאֲהַבְתֶּ֖ם <sup>157 </sup> <n>Love</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַגֵּ֑ר <sup>1616 </sup> <n>ye therefore the stranger</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> גֵרִ֥ים <sup>1616 </sup> <n>for ye were strangers</n> הֱיִיתֶ֖ם <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n>
20: אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֧ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> תִּירָ֖א <sup>3372 </sup> <n>Thou shalt fear</n> אֹת֣וֹ <sup>853 </sup> תַעֲבֹ֑ד <sup>5647 </sup> <n>him shalt thou serve</n> וּב֣וֹ תִדְבָּ֔ק <sup>1692 </sup> <n>and to him shalt thou cleave</n> וּבִשְׁמ֖וֹ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>by his name</n> תִּשָּׁבֵֽעַ׃ <sup>7650 </sup> <n>and swear</n>
21: ה֥וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>He</n> תְהִלָּתְךָ֖ <sup>8416 </sup> <n>He [is] thy praise</n> וְה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>and He</n> אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>and he [is] thy God</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> עָשָׂ֣ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that hath done</n> אִתְּךָ֗ <sup>853 </sup> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַגְּדֹלֹ֤ת <sup>1419 </sup> <n>for thee these great</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַנּֽוֹרָאֹת֙ <sup>3372 </sup> <n>and terrible things</n> הָאֵ֔לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> רָא֖וּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>have seen</n> עֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>which thine eyes</n>
22: בְּשִׁבְעִ֣ים <sup>7657 </sup> <n>with threescore and ten</n> נֶ֔פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>persons</n> יָרְד֥וּ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>went down</n> אֲבֹתֶ֖יךָ <sup>1 </sup> <n>Thy fathers</n> מִצְרָ֑יְמָה <sup>4714 </sup> <n>into Egypt</n> וְעַתָּ֗ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>and now</n> שָֽׂמְךָ֙ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>hath made</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>and now the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> כְּכוֹכְבֵ֥י <sup>3556 </sup> <n>thee as the stars</n> הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>of heaven</n> לָרֹֽב׃ <sup>7230 </sup> <n>for multitude</n>
